Reviews.Title: Fake cameras
Reviews.Author: JP
Reviews.Content: These are the same as the real cameras without the camera.  They look very real.  The only shortfall is that the 2 AA batteries that power them only last about 2 months.  But, you can leave them in place without the batteries - they just won't blink.

ProductInfo.Features:
Pair the PH301 with any Defender/SVAT systems to deter intruders or vandals and make your property appear to have a robust security system
Flashing LED will make your imitation camera even more noticeable and realistic
The ABS plastic housing and cable make it look identical to a real camera and is a cost effective crime prevention investment
You can easily mount the PH301 on your ceiling or wall and aim it using the adjustable bracket
The imitation camera is made of ABS plastic for durability and will not rust; This bundle includes 2 imitation security dome cameras
ProductInfo.Name: Defender PH301 Imitation Dome Security Camera with Realistic Flashing Red LED - Bonus Pack of 2
